page.title: 02 EDUCATION
page.content: In this area there are two primary schools and one residential school.Because of the decreasing number of pupils,some schools have introduced composite classes.This involves two primary groups being taught in one class by one teacher.Springside Primary School has 118 pupils divided amongst five full time teachers.Four of the classes are composite.Children from Springside attend Greenwood Academy,Dreghorn for their secondary education.Children from Gatehead attend Dundonald Primary School which has 332 pupils and 12 full-time teachers.They have 3 composite classes. Secondary education is provided at Marr College in Troon.Crosshouse Primary School has 252 pupils split amongst 10 full-time teachers.There are 3 composite classes.The pupils attend Grange Academy, Kilmarnock.Thorntoun sc
